  • 方法详细资料

    • create

      public static SECP256K1.Signature create(BigInteger r, BigInteger s, byte recId)
      Creates a new signature object given its parameters.
      参数:
      r - the 'r' part of the signature.
      s - the 's' part of the signature.
      recId - the recovery id part of the signature.
      返回:
      the created SECP256K1.Signature object.
      抛出:
      NullPointerException - if r or s are null.
      IllegalArgumentException - if any argument is invalid (for instance, v is neither 27 or 28).

    • decode
